column2: we train all of our front of house staff to REPEAT their customers' orders (sometimes three times) to ensure accuracy. This is good business practice. Moreover
column3: our staff and bartenders DO NOT ASK FOR TIPS. Our bartender says you handed her cash and a credit card
column4: and she asked you how you would like the bill split. Full stop. We are professionals in the food-service industry in Houston
column5: Texas. If our front of house staff asked customers to tip
column6: we would be out of business so fast your head would spin. I have been in the restaurant business in Houston for more than 20 years. I know what I'm talking about.
